boardgame.name: Milestones
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The settlement of the country is the work of the players in their role as noble builders in Milestones!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this game, players work together to build roads, create marketplaces, and erect houses. With each milestone set along the way, they move further into the country._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But while they build together, when it comes to procuring construction materials, money, and grain each player is on their own. Thus, you must carefully develop your own network of goods, trade and colonization materials and optimize its use cleverly. Whoever also develops a keen sense of timing can grab the most valuable building sites and in the end win out._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Game Pit: Episode 1 - Picking Over the Bones

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Stronghold Games (SG8006) You are a noble builder settling the country in Milestones! Players work together to build roads, create marketplaces and erect houses. With each milestone set along the way, they move further into the country. However, while building the country together, each is on his own to procure building materials, money and grain! Builders must cleverly optimize their strategy to get these resources. The player who grabs the most valuable building sites will surely win the game! Sales Points: A new circuit mechanic on individual player boards. Requires timing and pacing for building and resources. Players need to gather resources at the right pace so as not to lose them at the Castle, and simultaneously time their building when the best sites are available.
bilingual (D/GB) Pegasus edition just played once

Stronghold Games (SG8006)
You are a noble builder settling the country in Milestones! Players work together to build roads, create marketplaces and erect houses. With each milestone set along the way, they move further into the country. However, while building the country together, each is on his own to procure building materials, money and grain! Builders must cleverly optimize their strategy to get these resources. The player who grabs the most valuable building sites will surely win the game! Sales Points: A new circuit mechanic on individual player boards. Requires timing and pacing for building and resources. Players need to gather resources at the right pace so as not to lose them at the Castle, and simultaneously time their building when the best sites are available.

Stronghold Games (SG8006) You are a noble builder settling the country in Milestones! Players work together to build roads, create marketplaces and erect houses. With each milestone set along the way, they move further into the country. However, while building the country together, each is on his own to procure building materials, money and grain! Builders must cleverly optimize their strategy to get these resources. The player who grabs the most valuable building sites will surely win the game! Sales Points: A new circuit mechanic on individual player boards. Requires timing and pacing for building and resources. Payment of the purchased item is to be received within three days of confirmation. No new users please. If so, please contact me first by geek mail.

Game was played just a couple of times Payment: Advance payment by EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Please note that shipping costs are not included in the price and have to be added (within Germany it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s approx. 5,00 € for an average-sized game) If you also intend to buy some of my other games I put here on the GeekMarket Shipping costs would be adjusted accordingly (just PM me)

Stronghold Games (SHG8006) You are a noble builder settling the country in Milestones! Players work together to build roads, create marketplaces and erect houses. With each milestone set along the way, they move further into the country. However, while building the country together, each is on his own to procure building materials, money and grain! Builders must cleverly optimize their strategy to get these resources. The player who grabs the most valuable building sites will surely win the game! Sales Points: A new circuit mechanic on individual player boards. Requires timing and pacing for building and resources. Players need to gather resources at the right pace so as not to lose them at the Castle, and simultaneously time their building when the best sites are available.
